p: The siRNAs for STCH (HSPA13) and Hsp70 (HSPA1A) siRNAs were purchased from Dharmacon as ON-TARGET plus SMART pools (L-015679-00-0005 and L-005168-00-0005, respectively). HEK cells were first transfected with control or specific siRNA with Lipofectamine RNAiMAX (Invitrogen, Paris, France) using the manufacturerâ€™s specifications. One day after siRNA transfection, cells were transfected with NKCC2 plasmids. Then, 48 h after NKCC2 transfection, cell lysates were analyzed for each protein using the indicated antibodies.
